## Text Formatting

*italics* and **bold**


superscript^2^ / subscript~2~


~~strikethrough~~


`verbatim code`

## Headings
# Header 1
## Header 2
### Header 3
#### Header 4
##### Header 5
###### Header 6

## Links & Images
<https://quarto.org>

[Quarto](https://quarto.org)

![Caption](https://tinyurl.com/2hy53zek)

## Lists
* unordered list
    + sub-item 1
    + sub-item 2
        - sub-sub-item 1

---

*   item 2

    Continued (indent 4 spaces)

---

1. ordered list
2. item 2
    i) sub-item 1
         A.  sub-sub-item 1

<!--

term
: definition
